name: Food And Drink 45 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: Fried pork rinds has more protein than corn chips.
Which is an Italian cottage cheese?
In what country was ice cream invented?
questions.explanation:
China.

	According to the encyclopedia Encarta was invented probably around 2000 BC

questions.text: What are washed, scraped and cooked in white wine to make moules mariniere?
What type of restaurant would you probably be served soba noodles?
In Jewish cuisine what are latkes?
Ketchup was once sold as a patent medicine?
What country produces the original Edam cheese?
What country is the source of Stilton cheese?
